boardgame.name: Dinosaur Island
Остров юрского периода
공룡섬
boardgame.description: In Dinosaur Island, players will have to collect DNA, research the DNA sequences of extinct dinosaur species, and then combine the ancient DNA in the correct sequence to bring these prehistoric creatures back to life. Dino cooking! All players will compete to build the most thrilling park each season, and then work to attract (and keep alive!) the most visitors each season that the park opens._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Do you go big and create a pack of Velociraptors? They'll definitely excite potential visitors, but you'd better make a large enough enclosure for them. And maybe hire some (read: a lot of) security. Or they WILL break out and start eating your visitors, and we all know how that ends. You could play it safe and grow a bunch of herbivores, but then you aren't going to have the most exciting park in the world (sad face). So maybe buy a roller coaster or two to attract visitors to your park the good old-fashioned way?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Dinosaur Island board game Dinosaur Island is a hot new game from designers Jon Gilmour (Dead of Winter, Wasteland Express Delivery Service) and Brian Lewis (Titans of Industry) from Pandasaurus Games (Machi Koro, Yedo, Wasteland Express Delivery Service) with amazing, technicolor, ridiculously 90s artwork from Kwanchai Moriya and Peter Wocken. 2-4 Players; 60-150 minutes (scalable length regardless of player count), ages 10+ In Dinosaur Island, players will have to collect DNA, research the DNA sequences of extinct dinosaur species and then combine the ancient DNA in the correct sequence to bring these prehistoric creatures back to life. Dino cooking! All players will compete to build the most thrilling park each season, and then work to attract (and keep alive!) the most guests each season that the park opens. Do you go big and create a pack of Velociraptors? They’ll definitely excite potential guests… but you better make a large enough enclosure for them. And maybe hire some (read: a lot of) security. Or they WILL break out and start eating your guests—and we all know how that ends. You could play it safe and grow a bunch of herbivores… but then you aren’t going to have the most exciting park in the world (sad face). So maybe buy a roller coaster or two to try and attract guests to your park the good old fashioned way? When we first played Dinosaur Island we knew we had something extremely special on our hands. We had an accessible worker placement game that mixed some of our favorite gameplay elements rolled up in a theme that is ridiculously fun and perfectly integrated with mechanics. I love games that have simple mechanics that lead to incredibly tense decisions. Like a dice pool as a resource (DNA), set-collection, turn-efficiency, a clever auction mechanic, and extremely tense decisions about where to spend your time and energy? Yes, please! You can also focus on upgrading your laboratory to make dinosaur creation more efficient. But if you do, it means you’re spending less time on opening new rides. And the constant pressure to keep your guests safe while still turning a profit every season creates interesting decision making on players. It’s a nail biter, for sure. 2-4 Players 60-120 Minutes Ages 10+ Designed by Jon Gilmour and Brian Lewis Graphic design by Ian O’Toole Art by Kwanchai Moriya Build Dinos! Watch your security or they’ll escape! Variable game length! 10 full color DNA Dice 4 Park Boards 4 Lab Boards 1 Marketplace Board 1 Research Center Board 1 Track Board 50 Dino Meeples 80 Visitor Meeples 36 worker Meeples Rulebook Available Online

Played once as a 2 player then bagged and stored into the box. Please note that Boardgamegeek provides a Deluxe Edition components list under the Dinosaur Island FAQ heading and that there are 9 insult and 2 blank insult tiles in the Deluxe Edition rather than the amount stated. These are not used in the game but included for fun. In common with most Deluxe Editions (due to the crazy amount of components!) the corner of the lower box lid has a partial corner split that was evident on receipt of the game. Pandasaurus have stated that they will replace affected boxes when they complete another production run but of course there is no guarantee for this or date. Shipping in the UK will be £8 for collect plus economy and that includes insurance for up to £100. Collection is free. Shipping outside the UK is likely to be expected=nsive as this is a very heavy game! PayPal gift or bank transfer please due to the cost of this game.

This is for a deluxe edition copy of Dinosaur Island, which includes the hefty metal coins and exclusive stretch goals from the Kickstarter campaign. However, I am cutting down my collection and, given the player count + complexity level, it sadly will not hit the table enough times to justify a spot on the shelf.

Dinosaur Island: X-treme Edition all-new Kickstarter Exclusive X-treme edition of Dinosaur Island 1 copy Dinosaur Island: X-treme Edition Plus Kickstarter exclusive: 10 VIP Meeples 8 extra hooligan meeples 1 purple custom die 72 metal coins in 3 varieties! 12 molded plastic researched beakers 3 plot twist cards All new exclusive X-treme edition slap bracelet and of course the custom Dino Meeples!!! Will except Paypal (Sending to Friends or plus additional Paypal Charges), Bank transfer or Cash at pickup. Will ship at charge via DHL. €5,99 for within Germany. Shipping within EU is 15,99 to most destinations. You can check for yourself via DHL website. Game almost weighs 4 Kilos! (3,7kg) so Postage would be Package up to 5 Kilos. Neu und eingeschweißt. Spiel abholbereit. Kann gerne in Frankfurt am Main abgeholt werden. Es handelt sich um die Kickstarter Exklusive X-Treme Edition. Im Vergleich zur Retail Version beinhaltet sie zusätzlich: 72 Metal Münzen, 10 VIP Figuren, 8 extra Hooligan Figuren, 1 Lila Custom Würfel, 12 Plastik Reagenzgläser, 3 plot twist Karten, exklusives X-treme Edition Schnapp-Armband und natürlich die custom Dino Figuren. Akzeptiere Paypal (Freunden Geld senden oder zzgl. Gebühren), Überweisung oder Bar bei Abholung. Verschicke via DHL. €5,99 innerhalb Deutschlands. Innerhalb EU für die meisten Ziele €15,99. Genaue Versandkosten können auch selbst ermittelt werden via DHL Website. Spiel wiegt fast 4 Kilo!(3,7Kg) also würde man ein Paket bis 5 Kilo buchen müssen.
